casebody.data:
TRUMBULL CTY. BAR ASSN.
v.
LARGE 2018-0250 Supreme Court of Ohio. January 2, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

DISCIPLINARY CASES

On Certified Report by the Board of Professional Conduct, No. 2016-045. John Harold Large, Attorney Registration No. 0068732, last known address in Warren, Ohio, found in contempt for failure to surrender his attorney-registration card, failure to surrender his certificate of admission, and failure to file an affidavit of compliance on or before November 13, 2018.
